properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 1 at 8:23AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...Hale
and Marengo Counties.

.Heavy rainfall is expected to fall over the next 48 hours...
and a flood warning is now in effect. The river levels are based
on forecasted rainfall totals and river levels may change
depending on actual rainfall amounts...

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for the Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* from Friday afternoon until further notice...or until the Warning
is cancelled.
* At 8:15 AM Wednesday The stage Was 85.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 90 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by Friday afternoon and continue
to rise to near 97.1 feet by Monday morning. Additional rises are
possible thereafter.
* Impact...At 98 feet...Some cabins and trailers along the river
begin to flood.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
